column4: Hello, how can I install new gnome themes? i've extracted the archive file to /usr/share/themes, but it doesn't show up in the theme selection dialog.
- choose "install theme" and then the .tar.gz file
does it matter if it's bzipped?
please try it. I am not sure...
there is a whole bunch of themes in the ubuntu hoary universe repository, have you tried them?
i tried the install method.  it won't show up still.
i'm still on warty
no that does not matter
which one are you trying to install, so i can try too?
Aluminum Alloy - Smog
did you install it?
i downloaded it, opened system-preferences->theme, selected "install theme"
then I clicked on theme details
under window borders?
look in "window border" tab, and you will find it
yes
human is the 1st in the list.
what name does it go by? :)
try installing it the way i described in detail above, perhaps :)
so you just selected the .wal file?
worked. thanks.
cool
